title: Validation with Hibernate Validator
summary: This guide discusses how to apply Hibernate Validator for input/output validation in REST services, and also for validating method parameters and return values in business services. It includes setup instructions, creating a Maven project, adding constraints to your Java classes, automatic and manual validation techniques, and configuring Hibernate Validator extension in a Quarkus project. The documentation is intended to help developers integrate and leverage bean validation effectively within their Quarkus applications.
